body.name: 64” Phone&Tablet Tripod, Aureday Cell Phone Tripod for iPhone with Wireless Remote and Phone Holder, Extendable iPad Tripod Stand for Video Recording/Makeup/Live Streaming

features: 【𝐈𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐝 𝐓𝐫𝐢𝐩𝐨𝐝 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲】Crafted with high-quality aluminum alloy, it features thick non-slip rubber pads on its legs, ensuring enhanced stability during use. With a robust load capacity of up to 6.6LB, it provides reliable support for various photography needs. Whether you're capturing selfies, engaging in camera photography, live streaming, traveling, vlogging, pursuing fitness activities, or practicing dance, this versatile phone tripod serves as an ideal companion.

【𝐑𝐨𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞&𝐄𝐱𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐓𝐫𝐢𝐩𝐨𝐝 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐝】Designed to meet the demands of different photography heights, this adjustable DSLR tripod extends from 16.92in to 64in. It features built-in 2 bubble view levels that help you find balance and achieve accurate alignments. The 360° rotatable 3-way pan head with a convenient handle enables you to effortlessly capture broader views from any desired angle.

【𝐔𝐧𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐚𝐥 𝐌𝐨𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐞 𝐏𝐡𝐨𝐧𝐞&𝐓𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞𝐭 𝐇𝐨𝐥𝐝𝐞𝐫】Spring-loaded cell phone mount comes with your cellphone tripod is made of premium plastic and thicker rubber pads to grab your phone tightly. It accommodates cell phones and tablets with widths ranging from 2.56 to 8.66 inches, including popular models like iPhone 12/13/13 Pro/13 Pro Max/14/14 Pro/14 Pro Max, Samsung Galaxy series, iPad Air, and more.

【𝐖𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐞 𝐒𝐡𝐮𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫】Designed for both group shots and single full-body shots, our versatile video tripod comes with a small Bluetooth remote that eliminates the need for manual operation. Compatible with iOS and Android phones, the remote allows you to conveniently capture photos and videos from a distance of up to 33ft/10m. Its user-friendly design ensures easy connection and hassle-free use.

【𝐀𝐟𝐭𝐞𝐫-𝐒𝐚𝐥𝐞𝐬 𝐒𝐞𝐫𝐯𝐢𝐜𝐞】Our travel tripod kit includes a selfie tripod, a handy remote, a portable tripod bag, and a mount for phones and tablets. We proudly offer a 12-month warranty for this product, and our dedicated support team at UBeesize is always ready to assist you. Should you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us. We are committed to providing prompt and satisfactory solutions to ensure your satisfaction.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A must have for content creator! For smartphones&tablets&lightweight cameras

Adjustable 3-Way Pan Head Lock knobs control the head rotation and the center column axis extension. Universal 1/4 screw supports quickly installing the DSLR cameras. 2-in-1 Phone Mount Adjustable from 2.56" to 8.66", not only for mobile phones but also for tablets. When needed, you can snap the mic into its hot shoe mount. Aluminum Alloy Legs Made of high-quality aluminum alloy,be able to resist scratches from hard objects, durable enough to support longer service life. 4-section Lever-Lock The smartphone tripod comes with quick flip locks, extending up to 64inches. Tripod legs are wrapped with non-slip rubber to increase stability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and Convenient
reviews.reviewText: Works perfect with my camera, it’s super durable, is compact when folded and the perfect height when in use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer in Tripod Technology: Versatile, Sturdy, and User-Friendly!
reviews.reviewText: Wow, this tripod is a game-changer! I've used a few tripods in my time, but this one takes the cake. First off, the stability is top-notch. The aluminum alloy and rubber pads on the legs make it super sturdy, even when I'm out and about. I've used it for selfies, vlogging, and even some dance practice videos, and it's never let me down.The height adjustability is a lifesaver. It goes from about 17 inches to a whopping 64 inches, making it perfect for all kinds of shots. Plus, the built-in bubble levels are a nice touch for getting that perfect alignment.The universal phone and tablet holder is another win. It securely holds my iPhone 13 Pro Max and even my iPad Air. No wobbling or slipping, just a firm grip.And let's talk about the Bluetooth remote. It's so convenient for group shots or when I need to step away from the camera. It works like a charm up to 33 feet away and connects effortlessly.In short, if you're in the market for a versatile, reliable tripod, look no further. This one's a keeper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good little tripod.
reviews.reviewText: If you want steady shots you need a real tripod at the very least. This works rather well and is very stable for the price point. Great if you want something light weight for a backpack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've only used it twice since getting it but I definitely reccomend. Easy set up, easy break down i use it to film my kids basketball games and i can easily rotate back and forth along the court. My phone is secure and Fits great (S23 ultra W/otterbox) 10/10 reccomend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed.
reviews.reviewText: Found an app that turns a phone into a remote web camera. Got this tripod to set up to watch the birds at my feeder. The thing is amazing. It has 4 leg clips per leg to allow many different heights and it also has a center tube that you can further adjust height. And to top it off it has a bubble level. This thing is very versatile. As for sturdiness, it's holding a phone, not a box camera, so it is plenty sturdy for that purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Useful, but awkward
reviews.reviewText: The tripod is easy enough to put together, but it felt awkward using it (getting it into the right position. It is sturdy, but I'm not sure I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing product Amazing Price
reviews.reviewText: I watched a few videos before purchasing this tripod... It's even more impressive in person. Absolutely incredible product for such a low price. Sidney 🙂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best one Ive used yet!
reviews.reviewText: This is the third tripod Ive ordered because the other two were not flexible enough. I wanted to take video of something lying on a table and the others would not let the phone bend at a 90 degree angle toward the floor, they only went to the left and right.This one is adaptable for almost any angle you can imagine. Additionally, you can set this one up so that the tripod legs do not interfere with the photo area - which is a problem I had with previous ones.The remote is ok, but not the best Ive seen. It has a button for Andriod and a button for iPhone, but both buttons work with my Android.The legs and stem lock into place so there is no unexpected collapsing. You can use it as a selfie stick, but it is optimized for use as a tripod.
